question: What is the theme of the 13th Urban Mobility India (UMI) Conference to be organised by MoHUA?
explanation:
The 13th Urban Mobility India (UMI) Conference is to be organised by the Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs (MoHUA) on November 9, 2020 virtually.
The day-long Conference will be organised on the theme of “Emerging Trends in Urban Mobility”. It aims to focus on innovative measures taken to address the challenges posed by Covid-19 pandemic and to provide accessible transport to all.
